markdownRemark.html:
Chasing the impossible creates opportunities.

The pursuit of impossible dreams have allowed curiosity to evolve to reality. The world we live in now is built with the crazy minds that imagined possibility at first.

What did I did learn the following doing the same?

  • Discovered my fascination on culture, history, economy, ecology, climate science, philosophy… basically I wanted to know more about how the world works.. universal truths.
  • Money is one of the most powerful inventions ever made. Possibly bigger than the internet. It allowed the birth of quantifiable measurements to any concept there is the human mind can think of..
